member.name: M:RevitElements.Document.CopyElementsFromDocument(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document,Autodesk.Revit.DB.Instance,System.Collections.Generic.List{Revit.Elements.Element})
member.summary: This node will copy the given elements from the given document into the active document.
member.param: The instance of the link to copy from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.FamilyInstance.Room(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will report the room the family instance resides in, (if available).
member.param: The family instance to obtain room info from.
member.returns: The room in which the instance is located (during the last phase of the project).

member.name: M:RevitElements.FamilyInstance.Space(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will report the space the family instance resides in, (if available).
member.param: The family instance to obtain space info from.
member.returns: The space in which the instance is located (during the last phase of the project).

member.name: M:RevitElements.CurtainGrid.FullCurve(Autodesk.Revit.DB.CurtainGridLine)
member.summary: This node will retrieve the geometric curve from the curtain wall.
member.param: The curtain gridline to get data from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.CurtainWall.AddGrid(Autodesk.Revit.DB.CurtainGrid,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This node will add a gridline at the specified place on the curtain wall grid.
member.param: The curtain grid to add a gridline to.

member.name: M:RevitElements.CurtainWall.GetCurtainGrid(Revit.Elements.Wall)
member.summary: This node will retrieve the curtain grid for the input curtain wall.
member.param: The curtain wall to retrieve grid from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.BeamSystem.Members(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: Obtains the individual beams within a beam system.
member.param: The beam system to get information from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.BeamSystem.DropBeamSystem(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: Drops the beam system.

member.name: M:RevitElements.RoomTag.TaggedRoom(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will retrieve the room that a tag is tagging.
member.param: The room tag to retrieve elements from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.View.ConvertToIndependent(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will convert a dependent view to an independent.
member.param: The view to convert to independent.

member.name: M:RevitElements.View.GetCropRegionElement(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will obtain the crop region element from the view.
member.param: The view to obtain the crop region element from.
member.returns: The crop region as an element.

member.name: M:RevitElements.View.SetElementProjectionLineweight(Revit.Elements.Element,Revit.Elements.Element,System.Int32)
member.summary: This node will override the given element's projection lineweight in given view.
member.param: The view to set the overrides in.
member.returns: The crop region as an element.

member.name: M:RevitElements.View.GetFilterVisibility(Revit.Elements.Element,Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will supply the visibility of the given filter in given view.
member.param: The view to obtain filter visibility from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.ViewSection.OverrideCrop(Revit.Elements.Element,System.Int32)
member.summary: This node will override the crop region of the given section view based on the pen weight provided. Slower but more reliable version that uses transaction rollback to isolated the crop region element.

member.name: M:RevitElements.ViewSection.OverrideCropVersion2(Revit.Elements.Element,System.Int32)
member.summary: This node will override the crop region of the given section view based on the pen weight provided. This is the faster version that works with interior elevations.

member.name: M:RevitElements.Sheet.GetViewportsAndViews(Revit.Elements.Views.Sheet)
member.summary: This node will obtain viewports, views and schedules from a given sheet.
member.param: The sheet to get viewports from.

member.name: M:RevitElements.Sheet.Create(Revit.Elements.FamilyType)
member.summary: Creates a new sheet.

member.summary: This node will get the bounds of the view in paper space (in feet).
member.param: The view to get outline from.
member.returns: The bounds of the view in paper space (in feet).

member.name: M:RevitElements.ViewPlan.GetCropBox(Revit.Elements.Element)
member.summary: This node will get the bounds of the view in paper space (in feet).
member.param: The plan view to get outline from.
member.returns: The curves of the crop region.

member.name: M:RevitElements.ViewPlan.Rotate(Revit.Elements.Element,Revit.Elements.ModelCurve,System.Double)
member.summary: This node will attempt to rotate a plan view into a 3D view. Use at your own risk!

member.name: M:RevitElements.Viewport.Create(Revit.Elements.Views.Sheet,Revit.Elements.Element,Autodesk.DesignScript.Geometry.Point)
member.summary: This node will place the given view on the given sheet, if possible. For floor plan views: They cannot be on any other sheets. This is how Revit is.
member.param: The sheet to place views on.

The label outline of the viewport.

member.summary: This node will obtain the given information from the provided viewport.
